target.name: help
target.echo:
Specify one of these targets: compile-sdncontroller : compiles the SDN Controller application compile-collector : compiles the Collector application compile-xmlproxy : compiles the XML Proxy application compile-all : compiles all applications
pack-sdncontroller : compiles and packs the SDN Controller into a jar file pack-collector : compiles and packs the Collector into a jar file pack-xmlproxy : compiles and packs the XML Proxy into a jar file pack-all : compiles and packs all applications
clean-sdncontroller : cleans SDN Controller built files and directories clean-collector : cleans Collector built files and directories clean-xmlproxy : cleans XML Proxy built files and directories clean-all : cleans all applications
